query:
ALTER TABLE dojo_settings 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS notifyStaffOnNewLead INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS staffNotificationMethod VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'email',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS staffNotificationPhone VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS staffNotificationEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoSendSmsToLead INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoSendEmailToLead INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoUpdatePipelineStage INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bookingLink VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS setupCompleted INT DEFAULT 0;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS staffNotificationMethod VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'email',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS staffNotificationPhone VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS staffNotificationEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoSendSmsToLead INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoSendEmailToLead INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoUpdatePipelineStage INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bookingLink VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS setupCompleted INT DEFAULT 0;
